summary: improve Dependabot Alerts interface for closing Alerts
details:
This Improve reply is regarding the User Interface.

In my comment to close this _Dependabot Alert_, I am only able to create a text comment with newlines removed. My closure explanation is difficult to read.
**I would like to be able to create a normal markdown comment when closing a Dependabot Alert.**

The closed _Alert_ is here https://github.com/jtmoon79/super-speedy-syslog-searcher/security/dependabot/3

Screenshot at https://imgur.com/a/2Hvitg7
